entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 near midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h becoming north 20 late in the afternoon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023
